history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_sup_seq_lub,Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_sup_seq_lub,Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,Sup_seq_correct,is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_sup_seq_lub,Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,Sup_seq_correct,is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_sup_seq_lub,Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,Sup_seq_correct,is_sup_seq_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq,is_sup_seq_unique,is_sup_seq_ext,Sup_seq_correct,is_sup_seq_lub.

exceptions.exn: In environment u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar Heq : eventually (fun n : nat => u n <= v n <= w n) Unable to unify "Rbar" with "is_lim_seq u l".

In environment H : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "match ?M3096 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M3095 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M3095 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M3095 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M3095 n) M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap v eventually P".

In environment H5 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l H4 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = ?M3661 n) ?M3662 /\\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = ?M3661 n) b -> Rbar_le ?M3662 b)" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap v eventually P".

In environment H7 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l H6 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l H : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "match Sup_seq ?M4314 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M4314 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M4314 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M4314 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M4314 n) M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap v eventually P".
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment H10 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l H7 : forall u : nat -> Rbar, is_sup_seq u (Sup_seq u) H6 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l H : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "match ?M5686 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M5685 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M5685 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M5685 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M5685 n) M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap v eventually P".

In environment H9 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l H8 : forall u : nat -> Rbar, is_sup_seq u (Sup_seq u) H5 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l H4 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "match ?M6374 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M6373 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M6373 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M6373 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M6373 n) M end" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally l P -> filtermap v eventually P".

In environment H11 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l H10 : forall u : nat -> Rbar, is_sup_seq u (Sup_seq u) H7 : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_sup_seq u l -> is_sup_seq v l H6 : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l H : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l u, v, w : nat -> R l : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u l H1 : is_lim_seq w l x : nat H2 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> v n <= w n H3 : forall n : nat, (x <= n)%nat -> u n <= v n Unable to unify "match Sup_seq ?M7204 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (?M7204 n) (l + eps)) /\\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l - eps) (?M7204 n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (?M7204 n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (?M7204 n) M end" with "forall P : nat -> Prop, eventually P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => n) eventually P".

original: intros Heq. apply is_sup_seq_unique. apply Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq. apply is_sup_seq_lub. apply Sup_seq_correct. rewrite <- (Sup_seq_correct v). apply Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq. eapply is_sup_seq_ext. - apply Heq. - apply Sup_seq_correct.
